title: Fundamental Rights
summary:
### 📜 Fundamental Rights
- Enshrined in **Part III** of the Constitution.
- Enforceable by courts via **writs** (Art. 32).
- Can be restricted during emergency (except Arts. 20 & 21).

title: Directive Principles of State Policy
summary:
### 🏛️ Directive Principles of State Policy
- Part IV of Constitution.
- **Non-justiciable** but fundamental in governance.
- Inspired by **Irish Constitution**.

title: Indus Valley Civilization
summary:
### 🏺 Indus Valley Civilization
- Known for **urban planning** with grid system.
- Advanced **drainage system**.
- Economy based on agriculture & trade.

title: Quit India Movement (1942)
summary:
### 🇮🇳 Quit India Movement (1942)
- 'Do or Die' call by **Mahatma Gandhi**.
- Mass arrests and suppression by British.
- Major catalyst for independence momentum.

title: Monsoon in India
summary:
### 🌧️ Monsoon in India
- **Southwest monsoon**: June–Sept.
- Caused by **differential heating** of land & sea.
- Critical for agriculture.

title: Himalayan Ecosystem
summary:
### 🏔️ Himalayan Ecosystem
- **Biodiversity hotspot**.
- Source of major rivers.
- Vulnerable to **glacial melt**.

title: Fiscal Deficit
summary:
### 💰 Fiscal Deficit
- Excess of government expenditure over revenue.
- Financed via **borrowings**.
- Indicator of fiscal health.

title: GST in India
summary:
### 🛒 Goods and Services Tax (GST)
- **One indirect tax** for whole nation.
- Introduced in **2017**.
- Multiple tax slabs.

title: Climate Change
summary:
### 🌍 Climate Change
- Driven by **greenhouse gas emissions**.
- Impacts weather, sea levels, biodiversity.
- Mitigation: **renewables & afforestation**.

title: ISRO’s Chandrayaan-3
summary:
### 🚀 ISRO’s Chandrayaan-3
- Successful **soft landing** on Moon’s south pole.
- Boost to India's **space technology**.
- Demonstrates **low-cost innovation**.
